name: Brain Symphony: Relax & Meditation
summary:
Brain Symphony — A Calm Space in VR

Brain Symphony is an immersive VR experience designed to help you slow down, breathe, and reset your mind. Enter peaceful virtual environments built for stress relief, guided breathing, mindfulness, and emotional grounding  all designed to work naturally in VR.

Put on your headset, choose a Realm, and disconnect from daily pressure in minutes.

🌌 Cosmic Realm: Space to Let Your Mind Drift

Float through auroras, stars, and deep-space environments that gently react...
